00132 
00133   // (Serdar) i increased nsamples to 40 (was 16)
00134 
00135   if(nsamples < 40 ) return 0.;
00136 
00137   // Let's first find the pedestal 
00138 
00139   // (Serdar) here i check whether selecting the first 5 sample or 10 sample do change anything
00140   // on the pedestal determination, see histograms histPeds0first05bins or 10bins for more info
00141   // and i find both can be used, so i select first 10 bins to get more info.
00142 
00143   const int pedSamples = 10;
00144   double pedestalOffset = 0;
00145   double sumpedestal2 = 0;
00146   double pedestalsigma = 0 ;
00147 
00148   if(pedSamples > nsamples) return 0.;
00149 
00150   for(int i = 0; i < pedSamples; i++) {
00151     pedestalOffset += samples[i];
00152   }
00153   pedestalOffset /= pedSamples;
00154 
00155   for(int i = 0; i < pedSamples; i++) {
00156     sumpedestal2 += (pedestalOffset-samples[i])*(pedestalOffset-samples[i]);
00157   }
00158   pedestalsigma= sqrt(sumpedestal2/pedSamples);
00159 
00160   // printf("Pedestal = %f\n", pedestalOffset);
00161   // Pedestal found, let's look for a pulse now
00162 
00163   // (Serdar) here i calculated the sigma for pedestal calculation, then i will start
00164   // searching the pulse if sample is bigger the 4 pedestal sigma,
00165 
00166   const int kThreshold = 4*pedestalsigma;
00167 
00168   for(int i = 0; i < nsamples; i++) {
00169     double bin_content = -1.*((double)samples[i] - pedestalOffset);
00170     
00171     double next_bin_content = 0.;
00172     if(i<nsamples-1) next_bin_content = -1.*((double)samples[i+1] - pedestalOffset);
00173 
00174     if(bin_content >= kThreshold || next_bin_content >= kThreshold){
00175       sig_length_counter++;
00176       sig_over_thr++;
00177       
00178       if (sig_length_counter == 1){
00179         sig_first_index = i;
00180         // inspect left shoulder of this pulse
00181         int back;
00182         for(back=i-1; back>=0; back--){
00183           double cont = -1.*((double)samples[back] - pedestalOffset);
00184 
00185           // (Serdar) here i made 2 changes, first, instead of 1/4 of the kThreshold
00186           // i have 3/4, which equals 3 sigma at the left shoulder
00187 
00188           if(cont > 3*kThreshold/4 && (i-back)<4){ 
00189             // accept it still as part of the left shoulder
00190             sig_length_counter++;
00191             sig_first_index = back;             
00192           }
00193           else break;
00194         }
00195       }
00196     }
00197     else{
00198       if (((bin_content < kThreshold) || (i == nsamples - 1)) && 
00199           (sig_over_thr >= kLengthThreshold)){
00200         // It's the end of the pulse, so let's include part of the right 
00201         // shoulder
00202         int forw;  // index for samples right of momentary position
00203         for(forw=i+1;forw<nsamples; forw++){
00204           double cont = -1.*((double)samples[forw] - pedestalOffset);
00205           if(cont > 3*kThreshold/4 && (forw-i)<4){
00206             // accept it still as part of the left shoulder
00207             sig_length_counter++;
00208           }
00209           else break;  // probably pedestal so let's stop
00210           i = forw;
00211         }
00212         
00213         sig_integral = 0.;
00214         sig_max_height = 0.;
00215         
00216         for(int i = sig_first_index; i < sig_first_index+sig_length_counter; i++){
00217           double bin_content = -1.*((double)samples[i] - pedestalOffset);
00218           sig_integral += bin_content;
00219           if (bin_content > sig_max_height){
00220             sig_max_height = bin_content;
00221           }
00222         }
00223         
00224         // Let's only deal with one pulse at this time!!!
00225         break;
00226       }
00227     }
00228   }
00229 
00230   // printf("Pulse accepted from sample %d to %d with energy %f\n", sig_first_index,
00231   //     sig_first_index+sig_length_counter, sig_integral);
00232   hPulseIF->Fill(sig_first_index);
00233   hPulseIF->Fill(sig_first_index+sig_length_counter);

00235   hPulseIvsEnergy->Fill(sig_integral, sig_first_index);
00236   hPulseFvsEnergy->Fill(sig_integral, sig_first_index+sig_length_counter);
00237   return sig_integral;

00319       int sampleB0 = (overflowB0 << 12) |
00320                      (raw[j*10+4] << 4) |
00321                      (raw[j*10+5] >> 4);  
00322       int sampleA0 = (overflowA0 << 12) |
00323                      ((raw[j*10+5] & 0xf) << 8) |
00324                      (raw[j*10+6]);  
00325       int sampleB1 = (overflowB1 << 12) |
00326                      (raw[j*10+7] << 4) |
00327                      (raw[j*10+8] >> 4);  
00328       int sampleA1 = (overflowA1 << 12) |
00329                      ((raw[j*10+8] & 0xf) << 8) |
00330                      (raw[j*10+9]);  
00331 
00332      if(timestamp < lastTimestamp) {
00333        printf("Time ordering error!\n");
00334      }
00335 
00336       if(timestamp != lastTimestamp + 1) {
00337         if(!firstIsland) {
00338           int stop = processIsland(islandT0*2, islandNsamples, islandSamples, i);
00339 #ifdef PRINT_SAMPLES
00340           printf("*\n");
00341 #endif
00342 
00343           if(stop) {

00345           }

00355              sampleA1, sampleB1, sampleA0,sampleB0);
00356 #endif

00363
